framework.objects

Class CanvasObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • framework.core.UpdateObject
      • framework.objects.CanvasObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Clickable, Collisionable, Updateable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle, Line, Picture, Square, Text, Triangle

    public abstract class CanvasObject
extends UpdateObject
    The Class CanvasObject is an abstract base object for all objects that will be painted. If you want to create oneinherit this one.
    Author:
    Hans Ferchland
